meanings.definition: A display at the end of an aisle in a store.
meanings.sent1: The endcap showcased the new products in the store.
meanings.sent2: Customers often stop to look at items on the endcap while shopping.
meanings.sent3: The endcap at the store had a sign that said 'Special Offers'.
meanings.sent4: The endcap was like a mini treasure chest of goodies.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors on the endcap caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: A cap or cover at the end of something.
meanings.sent1: The endcap of the pipe was securely fastened.
meanings.sent2: He carefully placed the endcap on the marker to protect the tip.
meanings.sent3: The endcap on the pen had a unique design that glowed in the dark.
meanings.sent4: The endcap of the telescope revealed a whole new world.
meanings.sent5: She unscrewed the endcap of the flashlight to replace the batteries.
